dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July 1979
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Jotings about many things--nuclear protest, phone calls from old friends, childhood memories, the weather. Includes a letter from a friend about facing fear.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 260 1979-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
